plot: A young boy needs to stand up for himself or else he'll be bullied forever. Created in 48 hours as a part of the Vancouver Bloodshots Film Festival, October 2005.
title: The Bully Solution
plot_es: A young boy needs to stand up for himself or else he'll be bullied forever. Created in 48 hours as a part of the Vancouver Bloodshots Film Festival, October 2005.
